Posts.EditableText:
Why can I not publish my game? I click on the "publish" icon either pre loading editor or via loaded editor. 

It simply opens up a new tab, then eventually stops doing anything and page I activated the "publish game" from says : "Sorry, an internal error occurred"

NO PUBLISH. NO EXPLANATIONS, NO NOTHING!???

I have been working on this for nearly 2 years!!!

Posts.EditableText: Same Here, but i cant even START a new one
Posts.HTML: Same Here, but i cant even START a new one

Posts.EditableText:
> Same Here, but i cant even START a new one

If you get an internal error when trying to create a new game, it's because your connection isn't secure. Check the URL you're using, make sure that it starts with `https://` instead of `http://`. (Unless you're in a very small number of places where https is illegal because the government wants to spy on you)
